name: Why Owl Only Comes Out at Night
author: Gerald Bedeker, Wandile Mathe, Luke Mateman
description: The animals take turns at watching out for humans at night, but when Owl gets caught by a small boy what does he do? Will this action shape his future?

name: Big Fish and Little Fish
author: Hemalatha Kanagalingam, R. Surendran
description: Big Fish gets trapped in a net, will Little Fish find someone to help?

name: Teddyâ€™s Wish
author: Niti Krishnakumar
description: Teddy wants to start a shoe shop, but it is really difficult to make shoes, will he manage?
